data.name: Zombie Crisis: Last One Standing
data.detailed_description:
Zombie Crisis: Last One Standing is a LAN(local area network) Battle Royale genre game.

Features:

1, Battle Royale
After the game enters the Battle Royale level map, the player has nothing at first, need to find and collect weapons and ammunition and medical kits, and also need to avoid exposure to the safe area of continuous contraction, and the player who survives to the end will win.

2, Medium size map
Medium-sized map, the game has a moderate rhythm.

3, LAN connection
In the LAN environment, you can play with friends at any time.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Win7 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 or higher
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 460 or higher / AMD Radeon HD 6850 or higher
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Sound Card
